title: 5/10/17 - The coming 'Worthless Class' (with Yuval Harari)(Sen. Mike Lee Joins Glenn)
description:
The facts about James Comey and what's happening with Trump, Clinton and the FBI ...The left doesn't know which side to be on in the Comey firing ...Author of the book "Homo Deus" Yuval Harari explains what future technology will bring to mankind ...The coming marriage between humans and machines ...Are you supposed to cheer or jeer the James Comey firing? ...Senator Mike Lee calls in to discuss the latest regarding Comey's firing ...What is going on in DC??

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
